cork.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: the bark (=outer part) of a tree from southern Europe and North Africa, used to make things
cork.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: a long round piece of cork or plastic which is put into the top of a bottle, especially a wine bottle, to keep liquid inside
cork.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: to close a bottle by blocking the hole at the top tightly with a long round piece of cork or plastic
cork.translation[2].definitions[0].defin: the largest county in the Irish Republic
cork.translation[2].definitions[1].defin: the second largest city in the Irish Republic
